unit_learning_outcomes.description: Explains a sound research framework on which to identify and select data.
Communicate research concepts and findings effectively, clearly and coherently to an academic audience in written and oral form.
Rigorously apply good academic research practice and methods to address identified research question, including the ability to source and appropriately acknowledge sources and references.
Demonstrates clear research objective informed and supported by developments in the field and recent literature.

enrolment_rules.description: (MGSM950 or MMBA8150) and permission by special approval

assessments.description: The research project constitutes a written thesis of 12,000 to 15,000 words and a presentation. This Project includes a comprehensive literature review, a theoretical framework, a sound research model, results based on the qualitative or quantitative data analysis and a conclusion reflecting the findings which contribute to the existing literature.
Students will further advance their research project, begun in MMBA8150, by developing a research model and undertaking qualitative and/or quantitative analysis of data.

data.description: This unit is designed to be preceded by MMBA8150, in which the student commences the individual research project in a specified discipline. Students will further advance their research project, by developing a research model, undertaking qualitative and/or quantitative analysis of data, and concluding the project. The integrated overall research project for the combined units is expected to be 12,000-15,000 words.
data.title: Individual Research Project B

title: Individual Research Project B
